p: Moolya Testing
Test Automation for Industrial Automation Systems

blocks.text: Test Automation for Industrial Automation Systems

p: At Moolya Software Testing Private Limited, we lead globally in software testing and quality assurance, partnering with clients across industries to deliver top-tier solutions. Our services ranging from functional and automation to performance and security testing are designed to enhance software quality, efficiency, and productivity, ensuring client success and satisfaction.
We go beyond vendor roles, fostering deep co-ownership with customers.
We help customers address issues by focusing on cultural fixes.
Moolya empowers C-, V-, and D-level leaders with insights.
Moolya unifies Tech, Test, Product, Customer & Business insights to scale value.

h3: Fastrack Automation -Platforms & Tools supported for Web, Mobile and Desktop

blocks.text: Fastrack Automation -Platforms & Tools supported for Web, Mobile and Desktop

table: Fastrack Automation utilizes intelligent techniques such as AI and ML to automate test case creation, execution, and maintenance.
Traditional test automation often involves manual scripting of test cases using programming languages or automation tools.
Fastrack Automation is designed to be platform-agnostic, allowing testing across a wide range of technologies and environments without lock-in.
Automation scripts may be specific to certain platforms or technologies, leading to platform lock-in.
such as updating test scripts in response to
Fastrack changes in Automation the application, automates – Self reducing Healing. maintenance manual effort tasks, and improving reliability
Maintenance of automation scripts requires continuous effort, especially when dealing with changes in the application under test.
Fastrack Automation offers a scalable architecture that can handle large-scale test automation efforts with ease, enabling teams to efficiently test complex applications.
Scaling automation efforts to handle large test suites or complex applications can be challenging and may require additional resources.
Fastrack Automation provides a quick and easy setup process, allowing teams to start automating tests rapidly without extensive configuration.
Setting up automation frameworks and environments can be time-consuming and requires technical expertise.

h1: Case through Study Scalable – Enhancing Test Automation Reliability
p: The customer operates in the Industrial Automation / DCS domain where system stability and reliability are paramount.
They had a basic automation setup using TestComplete with VBScript.
Their primary goal was to establish a structured and scalable Smoke and Regression test suite to support their frequent software updates and configurations.

blocks.text: Case through Study Scalable – Enhancing Test Automation Reliability
The customer operates in the Industrial Automation / DCS domain where system stability and reliability are paramount.
They had a basic automation setup using TestComplete with VBScript.
Their primary goal was to establish a structured and scalable Smoke and Regression test suite to support their frequent software updates and configurations.

table: Legacy VBScript framework required high manual effort for script updates.
Only a few individuals understood the legacy framework. Risk of knowledge silos and lack of continuity.
Manual and slow testing cycles delayed product releases and upgrades.
Test runs not aligned to schedules; no ability to run in parallel or at scale.
Lack of actionable, detailed test reports delayed defect triage.
No clear mapping between manual test cases and automation. Gaps in coverage led to production defects.

blocks.text: Legacy VBScript framework required high manual effort for script updates.
Only a few individuals understood the legacy framework. Risk of knowledge silos and lack of continuity.
Manual and slow testing cycles delayed product releases and upgrades.
Test runs not aligned to schedules; no ability to run in parallel or at scale.
Lack of actionable, detailed test reports delayed defect triage.
No clear mapping between manual test cases and automation. Gaps in coverage led to production defects.

p: Prioritized automation of smoke test cases to enable early validation of critical workflows, providing faster feedback and reducing release cycle time.
Reducing High Cost of Maintenance
Replaced the legacy VBScript-based framework with a modern TestComplete + Python solution that is easier to maintain and enhances scripting efficiency.
Designed a simplified, modular framework and provided a low-code/no-code interface that allowed a small team to contribute to automation, reducing reliance on a large scale team.
Improving Visibility and Coverage Established traceability between manual test cases and automated scripts to ensure better coverage and reduce the risk of production defects.
Set up distributed, multi-system execution for daily test runs, allowing the framework to scale with application complexity and testing demand.

blocks.text: Prioritized automation of smoke test cases to enable early validation of critical workflows, providing faster feedback and reducing release cycle time.
Replaced the legacy VBScript-based framework with a modern TestComplete + Python solution that is easier to maintain and enhances scripting efficiency.
Designed a simplified, modular framework and provided a low-code/no-code interface that allowed a small team to contribute to automation, reducing reliance on a large scale team.
Improving Visibility and Coverage Established traceability between manual test cases and automated scripts to ensure better coverage and reduce the risk of production defects.
Set up distributed, multi-system execution for daily test runs, allowing the framework to scale with application complexity and testing demand.

table: Developed a modular and layered architecture using TestComplete as the core tool with Python for scripting.
Added a low-code interface on top for ease of test creation (e.g., form-based input, test case importers).
Designed the framework to support mapping between manual test cases and automated scripts via test case IDs.
Configured multi-system execution setup for parallel and distributed test runs.
Prepared the framework to integrate with CI/CD systems (Jenkins, Github
Actions, etc.) when required in the future.

blocks.text: Developed a modular and layered architecture using TestComplete as the core tool with Python for scripting.
Added a low-code interface on top for ease of test creation (e.g., form-based input, test case importers).
Designed the framework to support mapping between manual test cases and automated scripts via test case IDs.
Configured multi-system execution setup for parallel and distributed test runs.
Prepared the framework to integrate with CI/CD systems (Jenkins, Github
Actions, etc.) when required in the future.

p: Sample Test Report in TestComplete
Set up daily scheduled test executions across multiple virtual machines or test beds to ensure consistent validation.
Created an execution matrix that allows running specific suites (Smoke, Regression, Feature-wise).
list: Conducted weekly demos and review sessions with stakeholders to showcase progress and gather feedback.

blocks.text: Set up daily scheduled test executions across multiple virtual machines or test beds to ensure consistent validation.
Created an execution matrix that allows running specific suites (Smoke, Regression, Feature-wise).
• Conducted weekly demos and review sessions with stakeholders to showcase progress and gather feedback.

p:  Automation of critical smoke tests enabled daily confidence builds
 Simplified scripting and reusable components democratized automation.
 End-to-end mapping of test cases to scripts ensured better coverage.  Achieved 40% code coverage in Phase 1  Early defect detection through multi-system execution.
list:  Reduced regression test cycle from 3 weeks to 4.5 hours with automation and distributed execution.
 Python-based automation and low-code tools cut scripting and maintenance effort by 50%.
 Integrated dashboards and detailed reports led to faster issue resolution
 Enabled data-driven decision-making for QA and release teams.

blocks.text:  Automation of critical smoke tests enabled daily confidence builds
•  Reduced regression test cycle from 3 weeks to 4.5 hours with automation and distributed execution.
•  Python-based automation and low-code tools cut scripting and maintenance effort by 50%.
 Simplified scripting and reusable components democratized automation.
 End-to-end mapping of test cases to scripts ensured better coverage.  Achieved 40% code coverage in Phase 1  Early defect detection through multi-system execution.

•  Integrated dashboards and detailed reports led to faster issue resolution
•  Enabled data-driven decision-making for QA and release teams.

p: We have domain experience and understand the specific needs of Industrial Automation and DCS systems, such as real-time responsiveness, hardware-software interactions, and safety validation.
Our solution is not just technical— it’s tailored to your business context.
By replicating our proven strategy, we can help you achieve faster automation ROI, better release predictability, and higher system reliability.
Our modular, maintainable framework can be adapted to your current tools and teams with minimal disruption.
